languages.text: "Слыхал я, что, когда скоморох Блеф {rt_mf|ему|ей} ключ от Тассеры передавал, Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} к подарку {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyNotBuffonDecision}не притронул{rt_mf|ся|ась} даже{/d}. Слуге своему приказал{rt_mf||а}. Гнушается вида черни, как люб{rt_mf|ой|ая} аристократ{rt_mf||ка}. Так ведь было, Мейв?" {n}Слуга упирает руки в широкие бока и снисходительно смотрит на вас сверху вниз.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
заставили Абеляра взять ключ в диалоге Entry или заставили губернатора подать ключ
Пузатый простолюдин

traits.locale_text: "Слыхал я, что, когда скоморох Блеф {rt_mf|ему|ей} ключ от Тассеры передавал, {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyNotBuffonDecision}Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} к подарку не притронул{rt_mf|ся|ась} даже{/d}. Слуге своему приказал{rt_mf||а}. Гнушается вида черни, как люб{rt_mf|ой|ая} аристократ{rt_mf||ка}. Так ведь было, Мейв?" {n}Слуга упирает руки в широкие бока и снисходительно смотрит на вас сверху вниз.{/n}
traits.speaker: FW_GossipingCommoner2

languages.translation_comment:
заставили Абеляра взять ключ в диалоге Entry или заставили губернатора подать ключ
Пузатый простолюдин

languages.text: "I heard that when Bluff the court fool handed {rt_mf|him|her} the key to Thassera, the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyNotBuffonDecision}didn't so much as touch{/d} the gift. {rt_mf|He|She} ordered a servant to take it. {rt_mf|He|She} shuns the rabble, same as any noble{rt_mf|man|woman} would. That was what happened, wasn't it, Maive?" {n}The corpulent servant puts his hands on his hips and looks down at you with condescension.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Слыхал я, что, когда скоморох Блеф {rt_mf|ему|ей} ключ от Тассеры передавал, Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} к подарку {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyNotBuffonDecision}не притронул{rt_mf|ся|ась} даже{/d}. Слуге своему приказал{rt_mf||а}. Гнушается вида черни, как люб{rt_mf|ой|ая} аристократ{rt_mf||ка}. Так ведь было, Мейв?" {n}Слуга упирает руки в широкие бока и снисходительно смотрит на вас сверху вниз.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I've heard that when Bluff the court fool handed {rt_mf|him|her} the key to the Thassera, the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} didn't so much as touch the gift. {rt_mf|He|She} ordered a servant to take it. {rt_mf|He|She} shuns the rabble, same as any noble{rt_mf|man|woman} would. That was what happened, wasn't it, Maive?" {n}The corpulent servant looks down on you with condescension, his arms akimbo.{/n}

"I've heard that when Bluff the court fool handed {rt_mf|him|her} the key to the Thassera, the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} didn't so much as touch the gift. {rt_mf|He|She} ordered a servant to take it. {rt_mf|He|She} shuns the rabble, same as any noble{rt_mf|man|woman} would. That was what happened, wasn't it, Maive?" {n}The corpulent servant looks down on you with condescension, his arms akimbo.{/n}

languages.text: “我听说，当时，那个宫廷小丑闹闹准备把塔瑟拉的钥匙交给那位来自上界的大人，可{rt_mf|他|她}甚至连碰都{d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyNotBuffonDecision}没碰{/d}，而是命令{rt_mf|他|她}的仆人接过钥匙。{rt_mf|他|她}根本不愿意和我们这些底层人有任何接触，和这个世界的其他贵族没有区别。是这样吗，梅芙？”{n}眼前这位肥胖的仆人双手叉着腰，居高临下地看着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I heard that when Bluff the court fool handed {rt_mf|him|her} the key to Thassera, the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyNotBuffonDecision}didn't so much as touch{/d} the gift. {rt_mf|He|She} ordered a servant to take it. {rt_mf|He|She} shuns the rabble, same as any noble{rt_mf|man|woman} would. That was what happened, wasn't it, Maive?" {n}The corpulent servant puts his hands on his hips and looks down at you with condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我听说，当时，那个宫廷小丑闹闹准备把塔瑟拉的钥匙交给那位来自上界的大人，可{rt_mf|他|她}甚至连碰都没碰，而是命令{rt_mf|他|她}的仆人接过钥匙。{rt_mf|他|她}根本不愿意和我们这些底层人有任何接触，和这个世界的其他贵族没有区别。是这样吗，梅芙？”{n}眼前这位肥胖的仆人双手叉着腰，居高临下地看着你。{/n}
“我听说，当时，那个宫廷小丑闹闹准备把塔瑟拉的钥匙交给那位来自上界的大人，可{rt_mf|他|她}甚至连碰都没碰，而是命令{rt_mf|他|她}的仆人接过钥匙。{rt_mf|他|她}根本不愿意和我们这些底层人有任何接触，和这个世界的其他贵族没有区别。是这样吗，梅芙？”{n}眼前这位肥胖的仆人双手叉着腰，居高临下地看着你。{/n}

languages.text: «He oído que cuando Farol, el bufón, le entregó la llave de Thassera, {rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyNotBuffonDecision}ni siquiera tocó{/d} su regalo. Ordenó a uno de sus sirvientes que lo recogiera. Rechaza a la plebe, como cualquier otro noble. Es lo que pasó, ¿verdad, Maive?». {n}El corpulento sirviente pone los brazos en jarras y te mira, condescendiente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I heard that when Bluff the court fool handed {rt_mf|him|her} the key to Thassera, the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyNotBuffonDecision}didn't so much as touch{/d} the gift. {rt_mf|He|She} ordered a servant to take it. {rt_mf|He|She} shuns the rabble, same as any noble{rt_mf|man|woman} would. That was what happened, wasn't it, Maive?" {n}The corpulent servant puts his hands on his hips and looks down at you with condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «He oído que cuando Farol, el bufón, le entregó la llave de Thassera, {rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial} ni siquiera tocó su regalo. Ordenó a uno de sus sirvientes que lo recogiera. Rechaza a la plebe, como cualquier otro noble. Es lo que pasó, ¿verdad, Maive?». {n}El corpulento sirviente pone los brazos en jarras y te mira, condescendiente.{/n}

«He oído que cuando Farol, el bufón, le entregó la llave de Thassera, {rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial} ni siquiera tocó su regalo. Ordenó a uno de sus sirvientes que lo recogiera. Rechaza a la plebe, como cualquier otro noble. Es lo que pasó, ¿verdad, Maive?». {n}El corpulento sirviente pone los brazos en jarras y te mira, condescendiente.{/n}

languages.text: "Saray soytarısı Kurusıkı, Thassera'nın anahtarını ona uzattığında Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} hediyeye {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyNotBuffonDecision}dokunmadığını bile{/d} duydum. Hizmetkâra aldırmış. Her soylu gibi o da ayaktakımından kaçınıyor. Olan buydu, değil mi Maive?" {n}Şişman hizmetkâr, ellerini kalçasına koyup sana küçümseyici bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I heard that when Bluff the court fool handed {rt_mf|him|her} the key to Thassera, the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyNotBuffonDecision}didn't so much as touch{/d} the gift. {rt_mf|He|She} ordered a servant to take it. {rt_mf|He|She} shuns the rabble, same as any noble{rt_mf|man|woman} would. That was what happened, wasn't it, Maive?" {n}The corpulent servant puts his hands on his hips and looks down at you with condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Saray soytarısı Kurusıkı, Thassera'nın anahtarını ona uzattığında Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} hediyeye dokunmadığını bile duydum. Hizmetkâra aldırmış. Her soylu gibi o da ayaktakımından kaçınıyor. Olan buydu, değil mi Maive?" {n}Şişman hizmetkâr, ellerini kalçasına koyup sana küçümseyici bir bakış atıyor.{/n}

"Saray soytarısı Kurusıkı, Thassera'nın anahtarını ona uzattığında Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} hediyeye dokunmadığını bile duydum. Hizmetkâra aldırmış. Her soylu gibi o da ayaktakımından kaçınıyor. Olan buydu, değil mi Maive?" {n}Şişman hizmetkâr, ellerini kalçasına koyup sana küçümseyici bir bakış atıyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「あの宮廷道化師のブラフがタッセーラの鍵を天の{rt_mf|君|姫}に渡したとき、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}はその贈り物に{d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyNotBuffonDecision}触ることさえしなかった{/d}と聞いたよ。天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は、それを持ってくるように使用人に命令し、他の高貴な{rt_mf|旦那|奥様}がするのと同じようにその野次馬を遠ざけたと聞いたよ。そうだったんだろう、メイヴ？」{n}その太った使用人は、唇の上に手を置き、見下すようにあなたを見下ろす。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I heard that when Bluff the court fool handed {rt_mf|him|her} the key to Thassera, the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyNotBuffonDecision}didn't so much as touch{/d} the gift. {rt_mf|He|She} ordered a servant to take it. {rt_mf|He|She} shuns the rabble, same as any noble{rt_mf|man|woman} would. That was what happened, wasn't it, Maive?" {n}The corpulent servant puts his hands on his hips and looks down at you with condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あの宮廷道化師のブラフがタッセーラの鍵を天の{rt_mf|君|姫}に渡したとき、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}はその贈り物に触ることさえしなかったと聞いたよ。天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は、それを持ってくるように使用人に命令し、他の高貴な{rt_mf|旦那|奥様}がするのと同じようにその野次馬を遠ざけたと聞いたよ。そうだったんだろう、メイヴ？」{n}その太った使用人は、唇の上に手を置き、見下すようにあなたを見下ろす。{/n}

「あの宮廷道化師のブラフがタッセーラの鍵を天の{rt_mf|君|姫}に渡したとき、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}はその贈り物に触ることさえしなかったと聞いたよ。天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は、それを持ってくるように使用人に命令し、他の高貴な{rt_mf|旦那|奥様}がするのと同じようにその野次馬を遠ざけたと聞いたよ。そうだったんだろう、メイヴ？」{n}その太った使用人は、唇の上に手を置き、見下すようにあなたを見下ろす。{/n}

languages.text: « Il paraît que lorsque Bluff, le bouffon de la cour, a tendu la clé de Thassera {rt_mf|au Seigneur|à la Seigneure} Céleste, {rt_mf|il|elle} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyNotBuffonDecision}ne l'a même pas touché{/d},mais a ordonné à un serviteur de la prendre.Comme tous les autres nobles, {rt_mf|il|elle} ne veut rien avoir à faire avec les gens du peuple. C'est comme ça que ça s'est passé, pas vrai, Maive ? » {n}Le serviteur corpulent met les mains sur les hanches et vous dévisage avec condescendance.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I heard that when Bluff the court fool handed {rt_mf|him|her} the key to Thassera, the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyNotBuffonDecision}didn't so much as touch{/d} the gift. {rt_mf|He|She} ordered a servant to take it. {rt_mf|He|She} shuns the rabble, same as any noble{rt_mf|man|woman} would. That was what happened, wasn't it, Maive?" {n}The corpulent servant puts his hands on his hips and looks down at you with condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Il paraît que lorsque Bluff, le bouffon de la cour, a tendu la clé de Thassera {rt_mf|au Seigneur|à la Seigneure} Céleste, {rt_mf|il|elle} ne l'a même pas touché,mais a ordonné à un serviteur de la prendre.Comme tous les autres nobles, {rt_mf|il|elle} ne veut rien avoir à faire avec les gens du peuple. C'est comme ça que ça s'est passé, pas vrai, Maive ? » {n}Le serviteur corpulent met les mains sur les hanches et vous dévisage avec condescendance.{/n}

« Il paraît que lorsque Bluff, le bouffon de la cour, a tendu la clé de Thassera {rt_mf|au Seigneur|à la Seigneure} Céleste, {rt_mf|il|elle} ne l'a même pas touché,mais a ordonné à un serviteur de la prendre.Comme tous les autres nobles, {rt_mf|il|elle} ne veut rien avoir à faire avec les gens du peuple. C'est comme ça que ça s'est passé, pas vrai, Maive ? » {n}Le serviteur corpulent met les mains sur les hanches et vous dévisage avec condescendance.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich habe gehört, als Bluff der Hofnarr {rt_mf|ihm|ihr} den Schlüssel zu Thassera gegeben hat, hat {rt_mf|der himmlische Herr|die himmlische Herrin} das Geschenk {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyNotBuffonDecision}nicht einmal angerührt{/d}. {rt_mf|Er|Sie} meidet den Pöbel, genau wie alle Adeligen. So war es doch, nicht wahr, Maive?" {n}Der dicke Diener stemmt die Hände in die Hüften und blickt voller Abscheu auf dich herab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I heard that when Bluff the court fool handed {rt_mf|him|her} the key to Thassera, the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} {d|Encyclopedia:FW_KeyNotBuffonDecision}didn't so much as touch{/d} the gift. {rt_mf|He|She} ordered a servant to take it. {rt_mf|He|She} shuns the rabble, same as any noble{rt_mf|man|woman} would. That was what happened, wasn't it, Maive?" {n}The corpulent servant puts his hands on his hips and looks down at you with condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe gehört, als Bluff der Hofnarr {rt_mf|ihm|ihr} den Schlüssel zu Thassera gegeben hat, hat {rt_mf|der himmlische Herr|die himmlische Herrin} das Geschenk nicht einmal angeführt. {rt_mf|Er|Sie} meidet den Pöbel, genau wie alle Adeligen. So war es doch, nicht wahr, Maive?" {n}Der dicke Diener stemmt die Hände in die Hüften und blickt voller Abscheu auf dich herab.{/n}

So war es doch, nicht wahr, Maive?" {n}Der dicke Diener stemmt die Hände in die Hüften und blickt voller Abscheu auf dich herab.{/n}
